examples: tropical fruits, such as bananas and pineapples
frutas tropicales, como bananas y piñas
citrus fruits, such as oranges and lemons
frutas cítricas, como naranjas y limones
Eat plenty of fresh fruit and vegetables.
Coma muchas frutas y verduras frescas.
Eat five daily portions of fruit and vegetables.
Coma cinco porciones diarias de frutas y verduras.
